fact.description: Today's referee, Nestor Pitana, has blown to start the match.
Nestor Pitana signals a Germany throw-in in France's half.
In Rio de Janeiro, Toni Kroos of Germany is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Germany to take a throw-in in France territory.
Nestor Pitana signals a throw-in for Germany, close to France's area.
Can Germany get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in France's half?
Nestor Pitana signals a free kick to Germany.
France's Karim Benzema misses with an attempt on goal.
Germany have a goal kick.
France awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Germany.
Throw-in for France in their own half.
Ball safe as France is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Nestor Pitana signals a France throw-in in Germany's half.
Free kick Germany.
Toni Kroos instrumental with a fine assist.
Can Germany get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in France's half?
Germany to take a throw-in in France territory.
Throw-in for France at Estadio do Maracana.
Ball goes out of play for a Germany goal kick.
France awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for France at Estadio do Maracana.
Can France get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Germany's half?
France to take a throw-in in Germany territory.
Nestor Pitana signals a free kick to Germany in their own half.
Ball safe as France is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Germany.
Throw-in Germany.
Goal kick for Germany at Estadio do Maracana.
France awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for France in their own half.
Karim Benzema for France is whistled offside.
France awarded a free kick in their own half.
Nestor Pitana signals a France throw-in in Germany's half.
Nestor Pitana signals a Germany throw-in in France's half.
Can Germany capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Germany push forward at Estadio do Maracana and Benedikt Howedes gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined France defence.
France needs to be cautious. Germany have an attacking throw-in.
Germany have been awarded a corner by Nestor Pitana.
Nestor Pitana signals a free kick to France in their own half.
Nestor Pitana awards France a goal kick.
France drive forward and Mathieu Valbuena gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
France's Karim Benzema gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Germany defender.
Corner awarded to France.
France's Karim Benzema gets in a shot on goal at Estadio do Maracana. But the effort is unsuccessful.
France have been awarded a corner by Nestor Pitana.
Mamadou Sakho (France) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Germany goal kick.
Ball safe as France is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Nestor Pitana signals a free kick to France.
Nestor Pitana signals a free kick to Germany in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Sami Khedira for Germany who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
The match in Rio de Janeiro is underway once more.
Sami Khedira returns to the field for Germany after picking up a slight injury.
Free kick Germany.
Nestor Pitana awards France a goal kick.
Important block from the Germany defence as Karim Benzema fires in a strike for France.
In Rio de Janeiro France's Mathieu Debuchy is caught offside.
Can Germany get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in France's half?
France awarded a free kick in their own half.
France push forward through Karim Benzema, whose finish on goal is saved.
France have a dangerous throw-in.
Can France capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Germany's half?
Throw-in for France close to the penalty box.
Goal kick for Germany at Estadio do Maracana.
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the first half.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Nestor Pitana blows against France's Mathieu Valbuena for offside.
France have a goal kick.
France awarded a throw-in in their own half.
France to take a throw-in in Germany territory.
Nestor Pitana signals a free kick to France.
Can France get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Germany's half?
Nestor Pitana awards Germany a goal kick.
Throw-in Germany.
Nestor Pitana signals a free kick to France in their own half.
Corner awarded to Germany.
Nestor Pitana signals a free kick to France.
Germany's Sami Khedira has been booked in Rio de Janeiro.
France to take a throw-in in Germany territory.
Germany's Toni Kroos breaks free at Estadio do Maracana. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a France goal kick.
Goal kick for Germany at Estadio do Maracana.
Throw-in for Germany at Estadio do Maracana.
Throw-in for Germany in their own half.

Ball safe as Germany is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Germany.
France have been awarded a corner by Nestor Pitana.
Raphael Varane (France) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Throw-in Germany.
France to take a throw-in in Germany territory.
Mathieu Valbuena is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
The match is underway again.
Germany awarded a free kick in their own half.
Mathieu Valbuena is back on his feet again.
Corner awarded to France.
Nestor Pitana signals a free kick to Germany.
Nestor Pitana signals a free kick to France in their own half.

France have a goal kick.

Thomas Muller for Germany gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.

Throw-in for Germany in their own half.

Laurent Koscielny is on a sub for Mamadou Sakho for France.
France awarded a free kick in their own half.
France to take a throw-in in Germany territory.
France are pushing forward but Antoine Griezmann's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Germany at Estadio do Maracana.
Loic Remy is on a sub for Yohan Cabaye for France.
Germany's Andre Schurrle is on target but unsuccessful.
In Rio de Janeiro France attack through Mathieu Valbuena. The finish is off target, however.
Germany have a goal kick.
Throw-in for France at Estadio do Maracana.
France's Karim Benzema gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Germany defender.
Throw-in for Germany at Estadio do Maracana.
Blaise Matuidi of France smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Nestor Pitana signals a free kick to Germany in their own half.
France awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Germany.
France awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bastian Schweinsteiger (Germany) has received a first yellow card.
France are in shooting range from this free kick.
Nestor Pitana signals a Germany throw-in in France's half.
Throw-in for France in their own half.
In Rio de Janeiro Germany drive forward through Andre Schurrle. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Germany have a dangerous throw-in.
Germany make their second substitution with Mario Gotze replacing Mesut Ozil.
Can Germany capitalize from this throw-in deep inside France's half?
Corner awarded to Germany.
Olivier Giroud is on a sub for Mathieu Valbuena for France.

Throw-in for Germany at Estadio do Maracana.
Nestor Pitana signals a free kick to Germany in their own half.
Germany to take a throw-in in France territory.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the second half.

Christoph Kramer is replacing Toni Kroos for Germany at Estadio do Maracana.
Throw-in for France in their own half.
Nestor Pitana signals a free kick to Germany in their own half.
France awarded a free kick in their own half.
France drive forward and Karim Benzema gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Germany goal kick.
Nestor Pitana blows to end the match. The final score is 0-1.
